experiment.description: Meeting classification using Microsoft GPT-5 (dev-gpt-5-chat-jj) via SilverFlow LLM API

classifier.name: Microsoft GPT-5
classifier.note: GPT-5 is Microsoft's next-generation language model for enterprise applications

metadata.classification_method: LLM-powered semantic analysis with enterprise meeting taxonomy

meetings.subject: Calendar.AI Schedule | Pillar Review
meetings.bodyPreview:
Session Drivers/POCs: Santhosh Paramesh & Prathyush Kalashwaram

Meeting Objective: Review the feature adoption and coding execution progress against FY25 goals. Celebrate achievement and escalate issues that require LT support.



Pre-read material

classification.reasoning: The meeting is focused on reviewing feature adoption and coding execution progress against FY25 goals, which aligns with a formal progress review. The title includes 'Pillar Review' and the description mentions escalation to leadership and pre-read materials, both strong indicators of a structured review session. Although recurrence is not explicitly stated, the terminology and context suggest a periodic review rather than an ad-hoc planning or decision meeting.
key_indicators: Title contains 'Review', indicating a formal evaluation session
Objective explicitly mentions reviewing progress against FY25 goals
Includes escalation to leadership team (LT), typical of structured progress reviews
Pre-read material mentioned, common in formal review meetings
Duration of 60 minutes, consistent with in-depth review sessions

meetings.subject: Online A/B experimentation office hours
meetings.bodyPreview:

Please join us during our office hours on Tuesdays at 10-10:30 am (Pacific) or Thursdays at 11-11:30 am (Pacific) with your questions and concerns about BizChat online A/B experiments. Sign-up for Online AB office hours.

classification.reasoning: The meeting is described as 'office hours' for answering questions about online A/B experiments, which suggests an informational and support-oriented purpose rather than decision-making or planning. It is recurring and open for attendees to bring questions, aligning more with an informational briefing or Q&A session rather than a structured training or workshop. The lack of external attendees and the focus on providing guidance indicate an internal informational format.

meetings.subject: [US] Copilot Evaluation Platform Office Hour
meetings.bodyPreview:

Resources:
SEVAL Manual Book | Substrate Dev Center
1. Define Metrics | Substrate Dev Center
